structure.name: Adi Parva
structure.summary: Explains the origins of the Kuru dynasty, birth of Pandavas and Kauravas, and early conflicts.
key_events: Marriage of Pandu to Kunti and Madri

structure.name: Sabha Parva
structure.summary: Yudhishthira becomes king, performs Rajasuya Yajna, and loses everything in a deceitful dice game.
key_events: Building of the great hall Maya Sabha
Dice game with Shakuni and Duryodhana

structure.name: Vana Parva
structure.summary: Pandavas spend 12 years in the forest after losing their kingdom.

structure.name: Virata Parva
structure.summary: Pandavas live incognito for one year in King Virata’s kingdom.

structure.name: Udyoga Parva
structure.summary: Peace negotiations fail and war becomes inevitable.
key_events: Krishna offers Narayani Sena and himself

structure.name: Bhishma Parva
structure.summary: Beginning of the Kurukshetra war; Krishna delivers the Bhagavad Gita.

structure.name: Drona Parva
structure.summary: Dronacharya becomes commander; Abhimanyu is killed in the Chakravyuha.

structure.name: Karna Parva
structure.summary: Karna leads the Kaurava army; fierce battles occur.

structure.name: Shalya Parva
structure.summary: Shalya becomes Kaurava commander; war nears its end.

structure.name: Sauptika Parva
structure.summary: Ashwatthama attacks the Pandava camp at night.

structure.name: Stri Parva
structure.summary: Women mourn the dead; grief spreads across the kingdom.
key_events: Kunti reveals Karna was her son

structure.name: Shanti Parva
structure.summary: Bhishma, on his bed of arrows, gives teachings on dharma and governance.
key_events: Bhishma’s wisdom on duty, leadership, and ethics

structure.name: Anushasana Parva
structure.summary: Bhishma continues teachings until his final breath.

structure.name: Ashwamedhika Parva
key_events: Arjuna’s adventures with the sacrificial horse

structure.name: Ashramavasika Parva
structure.summary: Dhritarashtra, Gandhari, Kunti go to the forest for spiritual life.
key_events: Forest fire and passing of the elders

structure.name: Mahaprasthanika Parva
structure.summary: Pandavas begin their final journey to the Himalayas.
key_events: One by one, the Pandavas fall

structure.name: Svargarohana Parva
structure.summary: Yudhishthira reaches heaven and sees the final truth.

structure.name: Harivamsa (Appendix)
structure.summary: Details Krishna’s lineage, pastimes, and cosmology.
